about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A travel professional focused on air ticketing and reservation systems
about.content:
I am a ticketing specialist with many years of experience in aviation and travel. My daily work is centred around correct fare construction, routing, rule application and choosing routes that match the real needs and budgets of travelers.

I work with GDS platforms (especially Galileo), NDC connections and airline direct sell interfaces to optimise flights, insurance and ancillary services for both individual and corporate clients. In addition, I support aviation and air cargo teams with rate checks, routing and space confirmation advisory.

My goal is to provide clear and honest options without exaggeration, protect the client’s time and budget, and deliver the most transparent and efficient travel solution.
